name: Abyssos Prime Upper Districts
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Panoramic view of Abyssos Prime Upper Districts, grand pressure domes, coral spires, weather cues and particles, golden hour / night glow / storm, figures/vehicles for scale, cinematic concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, cinematic atmosphere, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Cinematic view of Abyssos Prime Upper Districts with architecture and inhabitants.
revised_prompt: Imagine a panoramic scene capturing the majestic aspects of Abyssos Prime's Upper Districts. This should depict a heroic, fantastical setting akin to a medieval-fantasy tabletop game. Behold grand domes built to withstand high pressure, intricately constructed from coral spires that add an organic appeal. The weather hints at an approaching storm, filled with dynamic particles. Incorporate dramatic lighting that captures the transition from the golden hour to a mystical night's glow. Include scaled figures and traditional vehicles to establish the immensity of the scene. Emphasis on painterly style that leans more towards aquatic fantasy realism with subsurface light refractions and bioluminescent accents. The color palette should lean towards teals, deep blues, sea-greens and be highlighted with pearl tones. Maintain the atmosphere cinematic yet devoid of modern tech, identifiable signage, sci-fi UIs, photoreal CGI effects, anime style, and bloom glare. Any symbols used should be culturally coherent, devoid of random strings, and meaningful within this fantastical context.
